Material used.Description: Experiments were performed using SH-SY5Y cells, a human neuroblastoma cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: DJ-1 protein levels were significantly reduced (approximately 40%) in cells expressing the c.125G>A variant compared to control cells.
DJ-1 protein levels were reduced (approximately 30%) in cells expressing the c.157G>A variant compared to control cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was loaded and analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells transfected with wild-type DJ-1 cDNA were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector transfection was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Tukey's post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: DJ-1 protein level between 80-120% of baseline.
Threshold for normal readout.Source: Estimated based on typical protein expression levels

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: DJ-1 protein level below 80% of baseline.
Threshold for abnormal readout.Source: Estimated based on typical protein expression levels
